1116447976476381184.text:
TIL: The US has an “adversarial legal system” in which the court acts as arbiter between plaintiff and defendant.

Most other countries have an “inquisitorial legal system” in which the court takes an active role in investigating the case.https://twitter.com/robinhanson/status/1116418648342781954 …

1119706603530248192.text: i’ll admit i had two people in mind with this question. one is @zooko, who seems especially sensitive to censorship, broadly construed — i.e., people monkeying with his information feeds. true/false/maybe?

1106744024096886784.text:
On a related note, and in all seriousness: I hereby invite you to unfollow me.

Please, if you'd consider it, you'd be doing us both a favor by following through. Life's too short to waste time on things you're not really into. Let's all tighten up our feeds, shall we?

1121583817200820224.text:
I’ve been thinking a lot about how to have more independence of mind, and then @ben_r_hoffman shares this wonderful post about it: http://benjaminrosshoffman.com/the-order-of-the-soul/ …

It’s long but great. And btw, I’ve enjoyed a lot of Ben’s other posts, and you might too.

1119707091252305921.text: the other is @webdevMason, who seems to have a heightened sensitivity to children’s growing minds (in some way that i’d love to hear her try to put into words)

1116822806094696448.text:
Re SpaceX: I've only ever had a dry, abstract appreciation for what they're doing. But this video gives me visceral awe:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VBlIvghQTlI …

Shows how fast the rockets are coming in and how much power/control are needed to stick the landing. Recommend watching with sound

1121247933075083264.text:
I’m pleased to see so many people bucking the default and choosing a pure chronological feed. 

Don’t let Twitter tamper with what you put in your mind.pic.twitter.com/MDc35vQ0vl

1121427786957111296.text:
In what ways do you think of yourself as neuro-atypical or contributing to cognitive diversity?

Follow-up: What kinds of cognitive diversity do you especially appreciate in others?

1120541337068154880.text:
What kind of a Twitter feed do you use?

— Algorithmic = “top tweets” first (now the default)
— Chronological = latest tweets first (previously the default, now opt-in)

1116922630328598531.text:
Can’t help but hope that all the bitching about SF housing policy is increasing the pot of glory to be had by the great man or woman who eventually steps up and fixes it.

“It’s hopeless, totally fucked” == “You’ll be a hero if you can solve our problem”
